Key Match Events: David Brooks opened the scoring for Wales early on
Neco Williams doubled Wales’s advantage with an unstoppable free-kick
Teemu Pukki scored for Finland before the break
Brennan Johnson's strike two minutes into the second half took the heat out of the tie
Post-Match Reflections: Wales will 'go toe to toe' with Poland in bid to reach Euros, insists Rob Page
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pick of the goals was an unstoppable free-kick from Neco Williams
Daniel James capped the scoring after a calamitous error by a dawdling Miro Tenho
Others: Wales ultimately blew Finland away after a brief scare

Given the apparent changing of the guard, it felt particularly apt that Johnson, not part of the squad that made it to the last 16 at the delayed Euro 2020 – and indeed Williams and Brooks, bit-part players at that tournament – had such a sizeable impact
